entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Granby
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:10 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Granby 11:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: E 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 20 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow except rain near the border in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
